price: 8. Allah ! Point d’autre divinité que Lui ! Il a les plus Beaux Noms.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ لَهُ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa lahu al-asmāu al-ḥus'nā
